settings.title: Ingredients
settings.content: Carbonated Water, Soluble Corn Fiber, Natural Flavor, Citric Acid, D-Ribose, Ksm-66 Ashwagandha Root Extract, L-Theanine, Stevia Leaf Extract, Ascorbic Acid, Bacopa Monnieri Extract, Panax Notoginseng Root Extract, Rosa Roxburghii Fruit Extract, Bioperine® (Black Pepper Extract), Niacinamide (Vitamin B3), Calcium D-Pantothenate (Vitamin B5), Thiamine Hydrochloride (Vitamin B1), Cyanocobalamin (Vitamin B12).
